title: Account Executive - Nordics (Remote)
description:
At Mattermost, we build the #1 collaborative workflow solution for defense, intelligence, security, and critical infrastructure organizations. Trusted by governments, financial institutions, and technology companies, our platform enables secure, efficient operations for the world’s most critical teams.  

  

We’re dedicated to empowering organizations to operate with confidence, reducing risks, and accelerating productivity. Guided by our core values of Customer Obsession, Earn Trust, Self Awareness, Ownership and High Impact, we collaborate closely with our customers to deliver solutions that meet complex needs and drive success.  

To learn more, visit www.mattermost.com  

The Account Executive is a senior sales position responsible for developing, managing and closing business within target accounts in our Mid Market & Enterprise focused sales organization. Note: This position requires regular travel.
### **Responsibilities**

* Prospecting and developing opportunities in target markets and accounts.
* Refining go-to-market strategy for the relevant markets and organizations in your territory.
* Engaging new and existing open source users of Mattermost to provide value around how users can be more successful with our technology platform and tools.
* Managing complex enterprise sales cycles with multiple engagement points in DevOps, IT, InfoSec and other lines of business.
* Executing solution and value selling to existing customer base and new prospects.
* Articulating and evangelizing the vision and positioning of both Mattermost and our products, and securing strategic commercial commitments.
* Building a pipeline of revenue and new logos for your target accounts.
* Accurately forecasting business on a quarterly cadence.
* Communicating with management and sales operations to ensure proper execution of documents and correct process, as well as following instructions or recommendations set by these teams and company management.
* Ensuring the successful rollout and adoption of Mattermost products through strong account management activities and coordination with pre-and-post sales engineering and support resources.
* Collaborating closely with sales leadership and fluently sharing key deal information to align extended sales engineering, pre-sales, product support teams and executive support. Become an expert in Mattermost, and in enterprise messaging & collaboration software

### **Requirements**

* Significant enterprise sales and customer facing experience.
* Experience selling a technical productWork under minimal supervision on complex projects.
* Track record in developing and closing large, complex deals 4+ years successful quota attainment Very motivated and goal-oriented.
* Dynamic experience in an emerging company environment.
* Creation and execution of territory strategy and business plans.
* Attentive to forecasting and business reporting responsibilities.


Mattermost is an EEO Employer, We are a remote-first, open-source company.  

  

We are continually working to expand our hiring in more countries and regions, ensuring compliance with local laws and regulations, which takes time.  

Mattermost values your unique perspective—we welcome all applicants. We encourage individuals from all backgrounds to apply and are committed to assessing candidates based on their skills and qualifications. We do not tolerate discrimination against staff or applicants based on race, religion, national origin, age, disability, pregnancy status, veteran status, or other personal characteristics.  

If you require accommodations during the interview process, please let us know—we’re happy to assist.

title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
**The Company**


Board Intelligence is a rapidly growing Software as a Service (SaaS) business, pioneering a suite of tools and services that supercharge the effectiveness of boards and leadership teams.


In summer 2024, we received substantial backing from K1 Investment – leading B2B Enterprise SaaS investors based in LA. Through both organic growth and acquisitions, our aim is to be the global leader in the board portal and board governance space. We’re at the beginning of a significant journey of acquisition and integration and expect to at least double our size in the next year. We have already acquired TeamEngine from Sweden in September 2024 and are looking for more superb talent to join us on this journey.


We’ve been helping boards to make smarter, faster decisions for over 20 years and have over 70,000 users engaged on our platform. We work with FTSE 100s, large privately owned companies, public sector and government departments, and have a great track record of growth and delivery.


We’re 150 people today and growing fast. As we grow, we’re fiercely protective of our friendly, high performing culture. With three international locations (UK, Sweden, Mauritius) and over 15 nationalities represented, the team is diverse and friendly, and most days you’ll find a social event or learning opportunity to get involved with.


Many of us, including our founders, have families and other priorities, so we know the value of a supportive company. And all of us like to have fun, so our regular company socials, away days and lunch & learns are always a highlight.

**What's the role?**


As a DevOps Engineer at Board Intelligence in Stockholm, you’ll bring energy, proactivity, and a passion for staying ahead of AI-driven developments in the DevOps space. With expertise in Google Cloud and AWS, coupled with strong Terraform skills, you’ll play a pivotal role in building and automating scalable cloud infrastructure across multiple sites and providers worldwide.


As the company experiences rapid expansion—through acquisitions and the integration of new tech stacks—you’ll be at the forefront of ensuring seamless scalability and innovation, enabling us to push into new countries and maintain our trajectory of exciting growth.

**Responsibilities**

* Architect and deploy robust, multi-cloud systems across Google Cloud and AWS, ensuring scalability, reliability, and top-tier performance
* Take ownership of moving on-premise systems to the cloud, automating workflows, and fine-tuning hybrid setups for clients who need to stay partially on-prem
* Manage Kubernetes clusters, ensuring streamlined operations through provider-managed services while constantly improving efficiency and reliability
* Lead critical upgrades, patching, and cleanouts to de-risk legacy infrastructure and strengthen the business’s tech foundation
* Build infrastructure solutions that scale with the company’s rapid growth into new markets, integrating and automating diverse tech stacks acquired through acquisitions
* Establish best practices for CI/CD, infrastructure as code, and system performance monitoring, ensuring teams are equipped for high growth
* Work with engineering, product, and IT teams to align infrastructure goals with business needs, driving innovation and seamless integration.
* Keep up with AI-driven developments and emerging DevOps tools, ensuring the company stays on the cutting edge of technology.

**Requirements**


We prefer to work with the best talent regardless of whether you are familiar with all of the tools that we use. We don’t need you to be familiar with everything on this list but experience in some or all of these areas will be useful and a willingness to dive in and learn the others, essential.

* Extensive experience designing and managing scalable, multi-cloud environments across Google Cloud and AWS, with advanced expertise in Terraform for infrastructure as code.
* Proven track record of leading cloud migration projects, including on-prem-to-cloud transitions, hybrid solutions, and automating infrastructure for scalability across multiple sites and providers worldwide.
* Deep expertise in Kubernetes, including optimizing and managing containerized workloads through providers at scale.
* Demonstrated ability to handle complex tech debt, driving critical upgrades, patching, and risk mitigation with a business-focused approach.
* Proactive, hands-on problem solver with senior-level experience in identifying, diagnosing, and resolving infrastructure challenges independently.
* Strong understanding of modern DevOps practices, including automation, optimization, and scalability for high-growth, acquisitive organizations with diverse tech stacks.

**Benefits**


We pride ourselves on our great working environment and package, which we can share upon application.

title: Business Analyst inom ServiceNow HR
description:
Business Analyst ServiceNow HR
  
Din roll
  
Vi söker Business Analysts som har erfarenhet av ServiceNow och framför allt HR modulen för uppdrag hos vår kund.
  
Som IT Business Analyst hjälper du verksamheten med att säkerställa att kraven på IT system och tjänster tillgodoser verksamhetens behov.
  
Du kommer verka i gränslandet mellan IT och verksamhet där du hjälper verksamheten att fånga och prioritera sina faktiska behov. Du kommer att driva workshops för att formulera och definiera tekniska-, affärsmässiga regulatoriska krav. Det innebär att strukturera och följa upp och säkerställa att olika regulatoriska krav tillgodoses. Du kommer vara ett viktigt stöd till verksamheten genom att ta fram analytiska och faktabaserade beslutsunderlag som bidrar till att nå vår kunds affärsmål. Då de värdesätter en lärande miljö så finns stor möjlighet till personlig utveckling vilket kan leda till spännande uppdrag och projekt.
  
För att passa in i denna roll
  
För att passa i rollen tror vi att du är analytisk och strukturerad med ett stort driv att utvecklas. Vidare så är du nyfiken på ny teknik, tar gärna egna initiativ och gillar att lösa komplexa frågeställningar. Att arbeta agilt bör vara något du trivs med. Då du kommer vara en del av ett team där man delar med sig av kunskap och tar hjälp av varandra bör du gilla att samarbeta. Vidare är du prestigelös och har en förmåga att kunna arbeta i både detalj och helhetsperspektiv. Du trivs med att vara spindeln i nätet, är flexibel och får saker att hända.
  
Du har erfarenhet av att hantera många olika intressenters varierande krav samt kan navigera och orientera dig i allt som detta innebär.
  
För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har erfarenhet inom följande områden:
  
Relevant akademisk examen (som systemvetare) eller motsvarande erfarenhet
  
Ha arbetat med kravhantering
  
Erfarenhet av arbete inom ServiceNow, primärt HR-modulen
  
Kommunikativ med mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift
  
God analytisk förmåga
  
Förmåga att driva och genomföra förändringar tillsammans med beslutfattare och utvecklare
  
  

**Vi ser gärna att du har någon av följande certifieringar:**  

Certified System Administrator (CSA)
  
Certified Application Developer (CAD)
  
Certified Implementation Specialist - Human Resources (CIS HR)
  
  

Även detta är meriterande
  
Erfarenhet av utvecklingsprojekt och från att verka i gränslandet mellan verksamheten och IT
  
Erfarenhet av att leda och fascilitera workshops
  
Erfarenhet av applikationsutveckling
  
Agila arbetssätt, ex Scrum eller DevOps
  
  

Säkerhetsprövning
  
Vi utför säkerhetsprövning till många av våra tjänster, så även för denna. Du behöver vara svensk medborgare.
  
  

Låter detta som en intressant roll?
  
Sök redan i dag så berättar vi mer. Vi behöver en ansökan, inkluderat CV, på svenska, som matchar vår kunds önskemål. Urval och intervjuer sker löpande så vänta inte med din ansökan då anbudstiden är kort.
  
  

NXT Interim och NXT Rekrytering är ett nischat och innovativt företag som är verksamma inom konsult och rekryterings branschen. Vi är verksamma inom HR, IT, Ekonomi, Sälj och Marknad och har 20 års erfarenhet i branschen. Vi erbjuder våra konsulter bl a sjukförsäkring, remote-arbetsplatser och flera andra förmåner som förgyller deras vardag.

title: Senior Elektronikkonstruktör, Karlskoga
description:
**Gå med i vårt team på VIPAS AB!**


Har du vad som krävs för att trivas i den dynamiska IT-konsultvärlden? VIPAS AB, ett växande företag, bjuder in dig att ta del av nästa spännande projekt som vår nya medarbetare!

**Om VIPAS:**  

Föreställ dig en värld där din affärsteknik är perfekt anpassad till dina mål – effektiv, skalbar och innovativ. På VIPAS AB är det precis vad vi strävar efter att skapa. Som ett IT-konsultföretag erbjuder vi inte bara tjänster, vi levererar skräddarsydda lösningar med hjälp av den senaste tekniken som Java och Python. Vårt team har gedigen erfarenhet inom mjukvaruutveckling, DevOps och ingenjörskonst, och vi leder er genom den moderna teknikens landskap med trygghet och framförhållning.

**Jobbeskrivning:**  

Vi söker en erfaren elektronikkonstruktör för uppdrag inom såväl digital konstruktion för signal och bildbehandling som analog konstruktion. Dina uppgifter kommer att omfatta allt från kravhantering till utveckling fram till färdig produkt. Du har dessutom goda möjligheter att välja inriktning efter intresseområde, med ett självklart fokus på att produkterna ska ha hög tillförlitlighet och framför allt fungera i krävande miljöer med stora mekaniska påfrestningar och varierande temperatur.Avdelningen som du kommer att tillhöra ansvarar för elektronikkonstruktionen till alla produkter med elektronikinnehåll.
  

Här kommer du, förutom att ta dig an elektronikkonstruktion för missilsystem, arbeta med civila tillämpningar inom områden som övervakning och säkerhet.Arbetet sker i projektform och du kommer att ha omfattande kontakter med andra teknikområden såsom system, mekanik och programvara.För rollen krävs genuina kunskaper inom elektronikområdet.  

  



**Arbetet inkluderar:**


* Elektronikkonstruktion - analog och digital
* FPGA konstruktion
* Analys och problemlösning
* Tolkning och nedbrytning av krav
* Stöttning vid test och verifiering
* Specifikationer, designbeskrivningar och rapporter


**Kvalifikationer:**


* Högskole- eller Civilingenjör med inriktning mot elektronik eller motsvarande
* Flera års erfarenhet av hårdvarukonstruktion – analog och digital
* Praktisk ingenjör inom systemteknik, elektronik och mätteknik
* Erfarenhet av Siemens Xpedition Enterprise verktyg för elektronikkonstruktion och simulering
* Erfarenhet av språk för konstruktion av programmerbara kretsar (VHDL)
* Erfarenhet av hårdvarunära programering (C/C++)


**Som person tror vi att du är:**


* Strukturerad, kvalitetsmedveten, drivande och kommunikativ
* Positiv och gillar att jobba med omväxlande arbetsuppgifter
* Van att ta egna initiativ och är öppen för nya utmatningar

Erfarenhet av att ta en ledande roll är meriterande.  
* 

Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar med krav på säkerhetsklassning kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.

 **Varför jobba hos oss?**  

VIPAS AB erbjuder attraktiva anställningspaket för IT-konsulter, i enlighet med Teknikföretagens (Almega) kollektivavtal. Att arbeta med oss innebär möjligheter inom olika branscher, vilket ger dig flexibilitet och möjligheter till utveckling. Om du är drivande och redo att anta nya utmaningar, är VIPAS familjen för dig!


Du kommer att vara en del av ett innovativt team som driver framtiden inom telekom, fordon, detaljhandel och bank. Om du är redo att ta dig an utmanande projekt och växa i en banbrytande miljö, är detta möjligheten för dig!

**Ansök nu**  

Tveka inte att kontakta oss på **kumud@vipas.se**

**Observera:** Ansök om du har **Sveriges PR/citizenship** eller ett **arbetstillstånd för Sverige**.

**Hur ansöker du:**  

Intresserade kandidater uppmanas att skicka in sitt CV och personliga brev. Gå med oss och driv innovation på VIPAS AB!


Observera att vi rekryterar löpande, vilket innebär att uppdraget kan stängas innan sista ansökningsdatum. Om du är intresserad rekommenderar vi att du ansöker omedelbart!

title: Test Lead
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Role:**  

You will be responsible for identifying, documenting, and prioritizing issues to ensure timely resolution and maintain delivery quality. A key part of the role involves overseeing test environment configurations and managing test data to enable seamless testing processes. You will serve as the main point of contact for testing, ensuring alignment with development teams, project managers, and business stakeholders.  

  

Furthermore, you will analyze testing processes and outcomes to identify areas for improvement and enhance both efficiency and effectiveness.

**Essential requirements:**

  

* You should have proven experience as a Test Lead, Test Manager, or in a similar role, particularly within system delivery and integration projects.
* Solid understanding of test methodologies, tools, and frameworks, including both manual and automated testing approaches.
* Strong skills in defect tracking, test case management, and test reporting, with tools such as JIRA, Azure DevOps, or similar platforms.
* Excellent communication skills, with the ability to work effectively across teams and convey testing insights to technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  


  

**Meritorious:**

* Familiarity with Lumera Core or similar insurance administration systems is advantageous.
* Experience in managing and coordinating test environments and data preparation.

 **Last day to apply**: 17-03-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

  



**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Systemingenjörer till framtida uppdrag!
description:
**Om företaget**


Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med flera tusen talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.  

  

Affärsområdet Surveillance är en av världens främsta leverantörer av övervakningslösningar, flygelektronik samt system för att upptäcka, lokalisera och skydda mot hot. På Surveillance hittar du en kreativ arbetsmiljö som kännetecknas av engagemang, professionalism och arbetsglädje. Placeringsort för denna tjänst är i Järfälla.

 **Dina arbetsuppgifter**


I rollen kommer du att vara en central funktion i företagets IT-miljö genom att utveckla, underhålla och optimera system och programvaror. Vi söker dig som snabbt kan anpassa dig till nya miljöer och arbeta självständigt med hög precision. Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter inkluderar:

* Systemutveckling och programmering i exempelvis Python, Java, C# eller liknande språk.
* Underhåll och förbättring av befintliga system och applikationer.
* Felsökning, testning och dokumentation av system och programvara.
* Implementering av databaser i SQL, MySQL eller PostgreSQL.
* Samarbete med olika avdelningar för att anpassa system efter verksamhetens behov.

**Din profil**


Vi söker dig som har en teknisk bakgrund och minst fem års erfarenhet inom IT/systemutveckling. Du är analytisk, problemlösande och trivs i en dynamisk arbetsmiljö. Du har lätt för att snabbt sätta dig in i nya arbetsuppgifter och kan arbeta självständigt för att driva projekt framåt. Vidare ser vi gärna att du:

* Har erfarenhet av systemutveckling och programmering i något av följande språk: Python, Java, C# eller liknande.
* Har erfarenhet av databashantering med SQL, MySQL eller PostgreSQL.
* Är van vid att arbeta med versionshanteringssystem som Git.
* Har erfarenhet av molnplattformar som AWS, Azure eller Google Cloud.
* Har kunskap om CI/CD-processer och DevOps-metodik.
* Är en lagspelare med god förmåga att kommunicera och samarbeta.
* Har en stark förmåga att arbeta självständigt och ta egna initiativ för att effektivt driva uppdrag och projekt framåt.


Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.

 **Ansökningsförfarande**

  

Letar du efter nya utmaningar? Varmt välkommen att skicka in din ansökan! Notera att denna annons gäller framtida behov. Vi kommer därför att kontakta dig först om ett behov uppstår som passar din kompetens och erfarenhet.


Det här är initialt ett konsultuppdrag via Skill, med goda möjligheter till förlängning eller övertagande av anställningen till Saab.


Vid eventuella frågor vänligen kontakta ansvarig rekryterare Clara Kindahl på mejl clara.kindahl@skill.se.

description:

title: Devops Admin
description:
### **Din roll**


Som DevOps Administratör hos oss arbetar du som konsult och stöttar våra kunder med att bygga och förbättra deras DevOps-miljöer. Du ansvarar för att designa, administrera och optimera CI/CD-pipelines samtidigt som du skapar effektiva arbetsflöden i nära samarbete med utvecklingsteam. En viktig del av rollen är att hantera Git-repositorier och använda Infrastructure as Code (IaC) för att automatisera och förenkla processer.


Du kommer också att arbeta med modern containerteknologi och orkestreringslösningar som säkerställer skalbara och hållbara system. Utöver det får du arbeta med monitorering, analys och optimering av prestanda för att kontinuerligt förbättra CI/CD-livscykeln.


Med varierande projekt och uppdrag kommer du att få insikt i olika branscher och tekniska miljöer, vilket ger dig en unik möjlighet att utvecklas och bredda din kompetens.

### **Vem är du?**


Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av:

* Mjukvaruutveckling och automation med **Python**.
* Administrera och optimera **CI/CD-pipelines**, med förståelse för arkitektur.
* Git repository management, Git workflows och branchingstrategier.
* Infrastructure as Code (IaC) och att sätta upp pipelines med verktyg som exempelvis **Terraform** eller liknande.
* Konfigurationshantering med verktyg som **Ansible**, **Puppet**, **Chef** eller liknande.
* Containerlösningar som **Docker** och orkestrering med **Kubernetes**.
* Monitoreringslösningar samt typer av metrics användbara i CI/CD-flöden.
* God förståelse för grundläggande cloud concept.
* Du behöver vara flytande i engelska och svenska.

### **Meriterande erfarenheter**


Det är extra meriterande om du:

* Har erfarenhet av **Golang-programmering**.
* Har arbetat med CI/CD-automationsflöden som inkluderat egen hårdvara, till exempel egengjorda testriggar.

### **Varför Knowit?**


På Knowit Connectivity får du möjlighet att arbeta i en innovativ och lärande miljö där du kontinuerligt utvecklas. Vi kombinerar teknik och kreativitet för att skapa värde för våra kunder och samhället. Som konsult hos oss blir du en del av ett kompetent team som brinner för samarbete, delning av kunskap och att lösa spännande tekniska utmaningar.


Vill du veta mer om hur det är att jobba hos oss? Besök vår hemsida eller kontakta oss direkt!

### **Låter detta som en roll för dig?**


Välkommen att skicka in din ansökan redan idag! Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig och diskutera hur du kan bli en del av vårt team.

title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
**The Company**
 Board Intelligence is a rapidly growing Software as a Service (SaaS) business, pioneering a suite of tools and services that supercharge the effectiveness of boards and leadership teams.
   

  

 In summer 2024, we received substantial backing from K1 Investment - leading B2B Enterprise SaaS investors based in LA. Through both organic growth and acquisitions, our aim is to be the global leader in the board portal and board governance space. We're at the beginning of a significant journey of acquisition and integration and expect to at least double our size in the next year. We have already acquired TeamEngine from Sweden in September 2024 and are looking for more superb talent to join us on this journey.
   

  

 We've been helping boards to make smarter, faster decisions for over 20 years and have over 70,000 users engaged on our platform. We work with FTSE 100s, large privately owned companies, public sector and government departments, and have a great track record of growth and delivery.
   

  

 We're 150 people today and growing fast. As we grow, we're fiercely protective of our friendly, high performing culture. With three international locations (UK, Sweden, Mauritius) and over 15 nationalities represented, the team is diverse and friendly, and most days you'll find a social event or learning opportunity to get involved with.
   

  

 Many of us, including our founders, have families and other priorities, so we know the value of a supportive company. And all of us like to have fun, so our regular company socials, away days and lunch & learns are always a highlight.
   

  

**What's the role?**
 As a DevOps Engineer at Board Intelligence in Stockholm, you'll bring energy, proactivity, and a passion for staying ahead of AI-driven developments in the DevOps space. With expertise in Google Cloud and AWS, coupled with strong Terraform skills, you'll play a pivotal role in building and automating scalable cloud infrastructure across multiple sites and providers worldwide.
   

  

 As the company experiences rapid expansion—through acquisitions and the integration of new tech stacks—you'll be at the forefront of ensuring seamless scalability and innovation, enabling us to push into new countries and maintain our trajectory of exciting growth.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Architect and deploy robust, multi-cloud systems across Google Cloud and AWS, ensuring scalability, reliability, and top-tier performance
* Take ownership of moving on-premise systems to the cloud, automating workflows, and fine-tuning hybrid setups for clients who need to stay partially on-prem
* Manage Kubernetes clusters, ensuring streamlined operations through provider-managed services while constantly improving efficiency and reliability
* Lead critical upgrades, patching, and cleanouts to de-risk legacy infrastructure and strengthen the business's tech foundation
* Build infrastructure solutions that scale with the company's rapid growth into new markets, integrating and automating diverse tech stacks acquired through acquisitions
* Establish best practices for CI/CD, infrastructure as code, and system performance monitoring, ensuring teams are equipped for high growth
* Work with engineering, product, and IT teams to align infrastructure goals with business needs, driving innovation and seamless integration.
* Keep up with AI-driven developments and emerging DevOps tools, ensuring the company stays on the cutting edge of technology.


**Requirements**
 We prefer to work with the best talent regardless of whether you are familiar with all of the tools that we use. We don't need you to be familiar with everything on this list but experience in some or all of these areas will be useful and a willingness to dive in and learn the others, essential.
   

  

  

* Extensive experience designing and managing scalable, multi-cloud environments across Google Cloud and AWS, with advanced expertise in Terraform for infrastructure as code.
* Proven track record of leading cloud migration projects, including on-prem-to-cloud transitions, hybrid solutions, and automating infrastructure for scalability across multiple sites and providers worldwide.
* Deep expertise in Kubernetes, including optimizing and managing containerized workloads through providers at scale.
* Demonstrated ability to handle complex tech debt, driving critical upgrades, patching, and risk mitigation with a business-focused approach.
* Proactive, hands-on problem solver with senior-level experience in identifying, diagnosing, and resolving infrastructure challenges independently.
* Strong understanding of modern DevOps practices, including automation, optimization, and scalability for high-growth, acquisitive organizations with diverse tech stacks.


**Benefits**
 We pride ourselves on our great working environment and package, which we can share upon application.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Har du erfarenhet av att arbeta som DevOps Engineer och söker en ny utmaning i karriären? Då kan vi på Centric hjälpa dig! Vi har flera kunder inom både privat och offentlig sektor som växer och därför söker vi nu flera DevOps som kan bidra med sin kunskap och stärka verksamheterna.
   

  

 Som konsult på Centric får du en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att göra karriär.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 
 Som DevOps Engineer spelar du en nyckelroll i att bygga och underhålla infrastruktur som stödjer olika utvecklings- och driftprocesser. Du arbetar nära utvecklingsteamet och kravställare.
   

  

*I denna roll som DevOps Engineer kommer du bland annat arbeta med att:*
* Skapa och underhålla molninfrastruktur med hjälp av verktyg som AWS, Azure eller Google Cloud
* Felsöka och lösa tekniska problem relaterade till utveckling och drift
* Implementera och hantera CI/CD-pipelines för kontinuerlig integration och leverans
* Automatisera driftprocesser med hjälp av verktyg som Terraform, Ansible eller Kubernetes
* Samarbeta med utvecklings- och driftavdelningar för att förbättra arbetsflöden och optimera system
* Hantera incidenter


**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 
 Rollen kräver ett proaktivt tankesätt och du har ett intresse för att automatisera processer samt lösa komplexa problem. För att lyckas i en roll som DevOps Engineer hos någon av våra kunder ser vi att du har minst två års erfarenhet av att arbeta med DevOps-verktyg och tekniker som Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Git etc. Som person är du kreativ och tar initiativ till att utveckla och förbättra. Du vågar att testa nytt och tänka annorlunda. Du kan arbeta självständigt samtidigt som du har god samarbetsförmåga.
   

  

*Krav*
* Minst två års arbetslivserfarenhet av liknande arbetsuppgifter
* Goda kunskaper om molnplattformar (AWS, Azure, GCP)
* Stark förståelse för infrastruktur som kod (IaC) och automatiseringsverktyg (Terraform, Ansible)
* God kännedom om nätverkskonfiguration och säkerhetsprinciper
* Mycket goda kunskaper i tal och skrift i svenska och engelska


*Meriterande*
* Flerårig arbetslivserfarenhet av systemadministration i en Linuxbaserad produktionsmiljö
* Erfarenhet av scriptprogrammering i Linuxmiljöer så som Python, Ruby, Perl eller motsvarande
* Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.


**Vad vi erbjuder** 
 På Centric får du de verktyg du behöver för att nå dina mål. Vi erbjuder alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Vi tycker nämligen att våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas. Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar. Vi genomför regelbundet spännande aktiviteter där du som konsult får möjlighet att träffa och umgås med dina kollegor under roliga och avslappnande former.
   

  

 Centric är ett IT-företag med 380 anställda, med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö och Linköping. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras tecknade kollektivavtal med Unionen.

title: Oracle Devops Engineer
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Business Consulting and Services
description:
What makes Cognizant a unique place to work? The combination of rapid growth and an international and innovative environment! This is creating a lot of opportunities for people like YOU — people with an entrepreneurial spirit who want to make a difference in this world.
   

  

 At Cognizant, together with your colleagues from all around the world, you will collaborate on creating solutions for the world's leading companies and help them become more flexible, more innovative, and successful. And this is your chance to be part of the success story: we are looking for an Oracle DevOps Engineer to join our DevOps team.
   

  

**About Cognizant EAS-Oracle**
 Cognizant is a highly respected and successful IT & business transformation partner for many distinguished organizations globally. We work with the world’s leading organizations to provide collaborative solutions to their business and IT challenges with innovative ideas. As Oracle solution practice (EAS-Oracle) our expertise in cloud and Oracle delivery empowers our customers with best-in-class service for digital transformation across 15 verticals including: banking and financial services, healthcare, retail, consumer goods and insurance.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As part of a DevOps team you will be building, supporting, migrating, and automating the Oracle environment on Exadata Cloud at Customer (ExaCC). Products supported within that environment include Oracle databases, Oracle Enterprise Manager, Oracle Key Vault and ExaCC.
   

  

 You will engineer the solution to build ExaCC platform to be compliant to regulatory requirements. You will be extensively working on Oracle Database migrations to ExaCC.
   

  

 A part of the workload will be developing the infrastructure as code to support CI/CD pipeline based on products such as Git, Jenkins, Ansible and Python.
   

  

 Your day-to-day activities will range from actual engineering the Database migrations and coding automation scripts to engineering new or adapted solutions for the customer. As part of the migration delivery team you will also be responsible for configuration of monitoring, maximum availability architecture (MAA) and support during and after the cutover window.
   

  

 You will work closely together with other teams and the Product Owner.
   

  

**Our ideal candidate**
* You are an experienced Oracle database administrator with Exadata/ExaCC knowledge and like to work in a DevOps team in a complex environment
* You love challenges and are motivated to achieve the project objectivesm. You are a team player, but also a self-starter
* You see the big-picture but like to go in detail to solve complex integration issues
* Experience with DevOps, Scrum, Agile
* Extensive experience with Oracle Enterprise Manager, Oracle Enterprise Linux and virtualization
* Good knowledge of Oracle Cloud Infrastructure


**What You Can Expect**
* Become part of a the ‘flag ship’ success story - We go through enormous growth!
* Based in the Nordics – we have offices in Norway, Denmark and Sweden in an European and Global network
* Organization driven by technology – We have a tremendous technology backbone
* Open, ‘can do’ team spirit
* Environment where you can make your own ideas reality
* To work on various challenging clients and projects


 We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, gender, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
   

  

 For more information contact: Cajsa.orvenholt@cognizant.com

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Vill du vara med och lösa en av de största samhällsutmaningarna? Trivs du i en miljö av innovationsanda, framåtdriv och starkt samhällsengagemang? Hos oss får du vara med och bygga upp en ny myndighet från grunden och bidra till att förhindra välfärdsbrott och den organiserade brottslighetens framväxt. Du får en arbetsgivare som månar om din utveckling och ger dig stort eget ansvar och mandat.
   

  

 Beskrivning
   

  

 Vill du använda din DevOps-kompetens för att bygga datadrivna lösningar som har en direkt samhällspåverkan? Hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta i en ny och dynamisk myndighet där utveckling av miljöer och plattformar är i fokus. Du kommer att spela en central roll i att utveckla och optimera våra data- och analysplattformar.
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 Du kommer att arbeta som DevOps engineer i Linux-miljö med att utveckla och underhålla robusta miljöer och plattformar för dataflöden och datalagring. Möjligheter till att arbeta med Infrastructure as code (IaC) och containerlösningar, genom teknologier som Ansible, Kubernetes och Docker. Även arbete med python-utveckling finns i rollen.
   

  

 Eftersom myndigheten och vår tekniska miljö är under uppbyggnad, kommer du att vara med och påverka hur vi bygger våra system, skapar interna standarder och implementerar nya lösningar. Din tekniska expertis kommer att vara avgörande för att skapa effektiva miljöer och system.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som har**
* Minst tre års aktuell arbetslivserfarenhet av utveckling, konfiguration och drift av Linux-baserade system on-premise
* Minst tre års aktuell erfarenhet av att använda DevOps och MLOps-metoder
* Goda kunskaper i GIT och arbetsflöden för kodhantering
* Minst ett års aktuell arbetslivserfarenhet av att arbeta med Ansible eller motsvarande


**Det är meriterande om du även har**
* Erfarenhet av containerbaserade lösningar, gärna Kubernetes
* Erfarenhet av arbete med nätverkssäkerhet och säker programutveckling
* God kännedom om vanligt förekommande open sourcelösningar inom datalagring
* Erfarenhet av att utveckla i Python eller andra språk som Rust


**Efterfrågade förmågor och färdigheter**
 Du har en stark teknisk förståelse och förmåga att arbeta med alla delar av att etablera miljöer och plattformar. Du är en självgående och lösningsorienterad utvecklare som har förmågan att ta ansvar för att driva tekniska projekt framåt. Du har god samarbetsförmåga och trivs med att arbeta nära kollegor inom olika funktioner för att utveckla lösningar som gör verklig skillnad. Du har ett högt säkerhetsmedvetande och hanterar känslig information på ett ansvarsfullt och korrekt sätt.
   

  

**Övrigt**
 Tjänstgöringsorten är i Stockholm. Myndigheten finns i moderna lokaler i närheten av Gullmarsplan. Befattningen är placerad i säkerhetsklass vilket kräver svenskt medborgarskap. Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid. Sex månaders provanställning kan bli aktuellt. Du kan komma att krigsplaceras på myndigheten.
   

  

 I denna rekrytering söker du med ditt CV. Istället för att bifoga ett personligt brev vill vi att du svarar på några frågor kring din kompetens kopplat till jobbet. Vi ber dig svara utförligt på dessa frågor. Arbetsprov kan bli aktuellt i urvalsprocessen.
   

  

**Är du intresserad?**
 Vill du veta mer om tjänsten, kontakta enhetschef Niclas Cederberg på telefon 010-572 7 576.Vi tar gärna emot samtal från dig som är intresserad av jobbet, men tackar nej till dig som säljer annonser och rekryteringstjänster.
   

  

 Kontaktpersoner för de fackliga organisationerna är Martina Jansson (Saco-S) telefon 010-3037653, Mattias Kollberg (Seko) telefon 010-482 17 59 och Michael Ohlsson(ST) 010-5727512
   

  

 Anställningsform: tillsvidare med provanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Stockholm | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2025/8 | Kontakt: Niclas Cederberg, enhetschef 010-5727576, | Publicerat: 2025-03-13 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-03-27

title: Senior Projekt Manager/Scrum Master
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Around 10 years experience working with thermal systems in the automotive industry.
* Previous experience as Project Manager within Thermal Development.
* Proven experience as a Scrum Master, leading and facilitating agile teams in a technical environment.
* Strong communication and coordination skills, with the ability to work across departments and with external stakeholders.
* Experience working in global and cross-functional environments.
* Knowledge of PLM/PDM systems.
* Experience with configuration management and variant handling.
* M.sc och B.sc in Mechanical Engineering


**Application deadline:** 
 19-03-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Platform Engineer
company_industry: Telecommunications and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Want to be part of shaping data governance at Telia and building Telia’s metadata management platform? We are now looking for an
 **engineer for Data Governance and Privacy Operations team** 
 in our Technology IT organization an exciting opportunity to join the journey to strengthen our data catalog and data lineage capabilities and help organization to unleash the power of data.
   

  

 The Data Governance & Privacy Operations team is responsible for building, securing and maintaining data governance & privacy at Telia which supported by our data governance tool suite. We play a key part in building the enterprise data catalog for Telia Company.
   

  

**As a Platform Engineer you will…**
 You will have a key role in the data governance team in supporting the
 **technical vision** 
 ,
 **roadmap** 
 , and
 **design** 
 for our
 **data governance** 
 tool stack in collaborating with the product owner and engineers. You will collaborate with stakeholders and play an important part in building target capabilities for the data governance tool suite and scaling of the tool suite within the organization.
   

  

 Your responsibilities will include supporting the Product Owner and Lead Engineer in achieving the vision and roadmap for the Data Governance tool suite, which includes the data catalog, data lineage, business glossary, and data quality. You will actively participate in
 **solution design, technical development** 
 , and
 **troubleshooting** 
 of the
 **data catalog** 
 . Additionally, you will handle maintenance, troubleshoot issues, and collaborate with stakeholders to ensure uninterrupted system performance and usability. Furthermore, you will stay updated on the latest market trends and industry best practices to continuously refine and update the technical vision. You will work with a wide set of stakeholders including software engineers, product owners, delivery leads, solution architects, data engineers and data architects.
   

  

 We are on a journey to become the new generation telco, and we believe that we can offer you an interesting opportunity where you will take part in continuous learning, work on improvements with your colleagues, and have fun along the way!
   

  

**Who We’re Looking For**
 You are someone self-driven who is
 **passionate about data** 
 and
 **engineering** 
 . You can express your vision clearly and have earlier experience in designing technical solutions. You are communicative and enjoy working in collaboration with multiple stakeholders to define needs and requirements.
   

  

 You are a self-driven and motivated professional who understands and anticipates stakeholder needs, demonstrating this in your proposed solutions. You approach problems in a structured and collaborative manner, identifying both short- and long-term solutions. Your curiosity enables you to quickly acquire new knowledge and apply it effectively, while you actively seek and act on feedback to enhance solution quality.
   

  

 With
 **3+** 
 years of experience working with
 **enterprise-level IT solutions** 
 , you have expert proficiency in
 **Python** 
 and
 **Kubernetes** 
 . You bring strong knowledge and experience in
 **PySpark** 
 ,
 **Java** 
 ,
 **Airflow** 
 ,
 **Unix** 
 , and open-source solutions. Your background includes solution design and integrating various technologies such as
 **REST** 
**APIs** 
 ,
 **Java** 
 ,
 **Python** 
 , and
 **JSON** 
 . Experience with
 **GitHub** 
 ,
 **Airflow** 
 , and
 **AWS** 
 is considered a plus. Additionally, you have a solid understanding of data warehousing concepts, including data modeling, data architecture, and data ingestion methods and practices. You possess professional proficiency in both spoken and written English.
   

  

 (Monthly salary range for this position: 3908 - 5863 EUR before tax deduction. This range is applicable for candidates based in Lithuania).
   

  

**We are more than a workplace**
 Join our inclusive team and collaborate with over 15,000 talented colleagues from around the globe. Recognized as a Climate Leader in the Nordics and Baltics, we're passionate about creating great products and delivering extraordinary customer experiences while always prioritizing sustainability. We believe our people are our most valuable asset, ensuring everyone feels welcome and valued. When you join us, you'll receive a comprehensive benefits package tailored to your local market, opportunities for remote work, and more. You'll also have the chance to earn a bonus based on your performance and Telia's results. If you want to make a real impact, this is the place where you belong.
   

  

**Ready to make better happen?**
 We´re looking forward to your application by 20/03/2025. Selection will take place on an ongoing basis and this position might be filled before the application deadline. Please apply through our recruitment system to keep your data safe, as we can’t accept resumes via email. Required background checks will be performed
   

  

 Got questions? Please reach out to Augustas Degutis (augustas.degutis@teliacompany.com) or Shifan Mihilar (shifan.mihilar@teliacompany.com).
   

  

**Join us and let’s make better happen – together!**

title: Senior Staff Data Engineer II
description:
**Hej, Truecaller is calling you from Stockholm, Sweden! Ready to pick up?** 




  





 Our goal is to make communication smarter, safer, and more efficient, all while building trust everywhere. We're all about bringing you smart services with a big social impact, keeping you safe from fraud, harassment, scam calls, or messages, so you can focus on the conversations that matter.
 



  




* Top 20 most downloaded apps globally, and world’s #1 caller ID and spam-blocking service for Android and iOS, with extensive AI capabilities, with more than
 **400 million** 
 active users per month.
* Founded in 2009, listed on Nasdaq OMX Stockholm and is categorized as a Large Cap. Our focus on innovation, operational excellence, sustainable growth, and collaboration has resulted in consistently high profitability and strong EBITDA margins.
* A team of 400 people from ~35 different nationalities spread across our headquarters in Stockholm and offices in Bangalore, Mumbai, Gurgaon and Tel Aviv
 **with high ambitions** 
 .



  





**We at the Infrastructure team,** 
 work on a vision to empower our product-oriented teams with a complete self-service analytics platform to make data-driven decisions possible in Truecaller, guaranteeing the stability, velocity, and delivery of the mainstream events pipeline.
 



  





**As a Senior Staff Data Engineer II** 
 within
 **the infrastructure team,** 
 you will play a pivotal role in ensuring that our data architecture is scalable, efficient, and aligned with both the data platform's needs and the broader objectives of our business units. You will collaborate closely with various teams to design and optimize our data infrastructure, ensuring that it meets current and future demands.
 



  





**The impact you will create:** 



* Lead the design, development, and implementation of scalable data architecture solutions that align with Truecaller’s business goals
* Contribute to and influence the data infrastructure roadmap both short-term and long-term, working together with the engineering manager to align it with the company’s objectives.
* Collaborate with the team to re-design and optimize the data infrastructure, ensuring high availability, reliability, and performance.
* Collaborate with various business units to understand their data needs and translate these requirements into robust data solutions.
* Stay updated on emerging trends and technologies in data architecture, data engineering, and cloud platforms.
* Provide mentorship and technical guidance to data engineers within the centralized engineering team and across business units.
* Drive continuous improvement initiatives to enhance data processing efficiency and scalability.
* Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for data systems, pipelines and workflows



  





**What you bring in:** 




* Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Data Science, or a related field
* 12+ years of experience in data architecture, data engineering, or a related role.
* Proven experience in designing and implementing scalable data architecture in a large-scale environment.
* Hands-on experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
* Expertise in database technologies (SQL, NoSQL) and big data technologies (Hadoop, Spark).
* Familiarity with data governance and data security practices.
* Experience with programming languages such as Python or Scala.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively across teams.
* Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to handle complex data challenges.
* Ability to balance long-term strategic thinking with short-term execution.



  





**It would be great if you also have:** 



* Knowledge of DevOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code, and automation of data infrastructure deployments.
* Understanding of how to architect data solutions that support machine learning pipelines and AI applications.



  





**Life at Truecaller -** 
 Behind the code:
 **https://www.instagram.com/lifeattruecaller/**




  





**Sounds like your dream job?** 




  





 We will fill the position as soon as we find the right candidate, so please send your application as soon as possible. As part of the recruitment process, we will conduct a background check.
 



  





**This position is based in Stockholm, Sweden.** 




  





 We only accept applications
 **in English** 
 .
 



  





**What we offer:** 



* **A smart, talented, and agile team:** 
 An international team where ~35 nationalities are working together in several locations and time zones with a learning, sharing, and fun environment.
* **A great compensation package:** 
 Competitive salary, 30 days of paid vacation, flexible working hours, private health insurance, parental leave top-up, pension contribution, Udemy membership to keep learning and improving, and free gym membership.
* **Great tech tools:** 
 Pick the computer and phone you most fancy within our budget ranges.
* **Office life:** 
 We strongly believe in in-person collaboration and follow an office-first approach while offering some flexibility. Enjoy your days with great colleagues with loads of good stuff to learn from, and a wide range of yummy snacks and beverages. In addition, now and then check out the playroom for a fun break or join our exciting parties and or team activities such as Lab days, Running team, movie nights in our cinema, or a Geek lunch. There is something for everyone!



  





**Come as you are:** 




 Truecaller is diverse, equal, and inclusive. We need a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, beliefs, and experiences to keep building our great products. No matter where you are based, which language you speak, your accent, race, religion, color, nationality, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, etc.
 **All those things make you who you are, and that’s why we would love to meet you**

title: Data Engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*

 In this role, you will provide clean, transformed data for users to analyze. You will collaborate closely with other areas of the business to understand upcoming needs. You will apply best practices from software engineering to analytics code, ensuring version control, testing, and a flexible development process. You will make complex data easily understandable by using tools like Power BI, Hex.tech, and others. title: Google Cloud Platform Engineer | SEB, Solna
description:
*SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From Java to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone.*
 Join SEB’s Cloud Tribe and help shape the future of scalable, secure, and innovative products by advancing Public Cloud technologies. Take on this exciting challenge and make a real impact!
   

  

**About the role:**
 As a
 **Cloud Engineer** 
 within our Cloud Tribe, you will join a team of 25 highly engaged peers using new technology to develop and maintain services on top of Public Cloud Platforms catering for the platform’s technical Governance & Compliance. Work closely with operations, maintenance, and security of the platform. Our delivery includes guardrails, best practices, and supporting functionalities, all of which are paving the way for SEB’s developers to create a modern bank in the Clouds.
   

  

 As part of the Cloud Core Platforms, we offer a unique opportunity to be part of building the foundation of a paradigm change in banking. Being part of a multi-cloud tribe you will have the opportunity to gain skill and experience in multiple Public Cloud environments
 **.**
**To thrive in this position, we believe you have:**
* Hands on experience with Google Cloud.
* Understanding other Cloud Platforms such as AWS and Azure.
* Experience with Infrastructure as Code (such as Terraform), automation and CI/CD
* Experience with TypeScript, Bash and Python.
* Understanding of logging, monitoring and observability platforms.
* Knowledge of Agile principles
* Motivation and eagerness to learn


**What we offer:**
* Entrepreneurial Scandinavian environment: work-life balance, international working environment, hybrid work model, empowering and welcoming culture
* Growth culture: extensive training and learning opportunities, local and international internal mobility possibilities, long-term stability
* Modern environment: innovative company in forefront of technology, challenging, cutting-edge work, excellent office environment, agile and modern ways of working
* Additional monetary benefits : paid seniority vacation and volunteering days, allocations to Your pension fund, profit sharing programme, and additional health insurance


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than
 **Aptil the 13th, 2025.**
**Learn more about working at SEB: Technology | SEB**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Test Lead

**Meritorious**

title: Solution Architect
description:
Sword Services Greece is looking for a Solutions Architect to join our international Software Development team. The successful candidate will work in a multinational environment, supporting large-scale IT systems that drive operational efficiency and digital transformation.
 



 This role requires expertise in software development, system architecture, and process optimization. You will be responsible for developing enterprise applications, analyzing business needs, configuring cloud-based solutions, automating workflows, and ensuring optimal system performance.
 



  





 What You Will Do…
 



  




* Support the development and implementation of long-term strategies in the required domain (business process, information, application, and technology).
* Define and design as-is and to-be models for the domain.
* Define and develop architecture frameworks, concepts, and methods.
* Describe and analyze as-is situations in the domains.
* Facilitate development work with architecture support.
* Communicate and explain architecture deliverables.
* Create and maintain models in Sparx Enterprise Architect (or other tools).
* Ensure incorporation of security by design.
* Develop and maintain a comprehensive record of usability requirements.
* Develop relevant IT products.



  





  





 What Is Your Experience…
 



  




* University degree with a minimum of 6 years of experience in IT OR a non-university degree with a minimum of 12 years of experience in IT.
* Experience with DevOps practices, CI/CD, and automation.
* Programming/scripting experience.
* Experience in the application of enterprise architecture frameworks and methods (TOGAF).
* Experience with architecture practices in at least one domain (business process, information, application, and technology).
* Experience in modeling languages and concepts (e.g., ArchiMate).
* Experience in teamwork facilitation and consulting.



  





  





*Experience in the Following Will Be Considered as an Asset:* 




  




* Knowledge in public health.
* Knowledge of design patterns in big data, cloud solutions (Azure), and artificial intelligence.
* Experience in enterprise transformation projects.
* Experience in designing, maintaining, and implementing an IT strategy.
* Experience using relevant IT architecture tools (e.g., Sparx Enterprise Architect).
* Experience expressing complex technical concepts effectively, both verbally and in writing.
* Experience working well with people from many different disciplines with varying degrees of technical knowledge.



  





  





 Personal Characteristics…
 



  




* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with attention to detail.
* Ability to work independently, ensuring high-quality outcomes.
* Excellent communication skills, capable of translating complex technical concepts into business-friendly language.
* Team-oriented mindset, collaborating across technical and business domains.
* Proactive approach, managing tasks efficiently to meet agreed deadlines.



  





**Applications Must Be in the English Language.** 




**No Visa Sponsorship Available.**

title: *SAP Integration Engineer
description:
**SAP Integration Engineer**
**Seniority Level** 
 : Senior
   

  

**Location** 
 : Stockholm (SE) / Remote (25% in-office)
   

  

**Pay:** 
 Open to Bid
 **Assignment Duration**

**Role Overview:**
 As an SAP Integration Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining integration solutions using SAP Integration Suite tools and technologies. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and transform them into scalable, efficient integration solutions.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities:
   

  

* Collaborate with business stakeholders and technical teams to gather integration requirements and design efficient, scalable integration solutions.
* Develop and implement integration solutions using SAP Integration Suite tools, including SAP Cloud Integration, SAP Process Integration (PI), and SAP API Management.
* Create and maintain comprehensive technical documentation related to system integration.
* Offer technical guidance and support to developers and other team members.
* Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to system integration.
* Stay updated on the latest trends in SAP Integration Suite and related technologies and assess their potential to improve integration capabilities.
* Participate in quality control processes, including code reviews.
* Identify and implement process improvements.
* Communicate effectively with internal teams, clients, and stakeholders.
* Collaborate with project managers and stakeholders to ensure timely delivery of integration solutions.


 Ideal Candidate Attributes:
   

  

* A strong business and technical background.
* Excellent analytical skills and the ability to specify requirements.
* Proactive, detail-oriented, and quality-focused.
* Strong problem-solving capabilities.
* Effective communication skills, with the ability to bridge the gap between technical teams and non-technical HR stakeholders.


 Required Experience and Qualifications:
   

  

* Experience programming in SAP BTP and platform services.
* In-depth knowledge of integration patterns, best practices, and industry standards.
* Hands-on experience with SAP Cloud Platform Integration tools.
* Proficiency in JavaScript, Groovy, or other object-oriented programming languages.
* Experience with integration development guidelines, performance optimization, transaction handling, monitoring, and alerting.
* Familiarity with the SAP SuccessFactors data model and entities.
* A DevOps mindset with ownership throughout the deployment lifecycle.
* Experience in the HR domain and with HR system implementations.
* Strong English communication skills, with experience in international collaboration.


 Additional Skills (Preferred):
   

  

* Familiarity with SAP HR products like SuccessFactors, SAP S/4HANA, and SAP ERP.
* Experience with API development and middleware platforms (e.g., MuleSoft, Dell Boomi, Workato).
* Knowledge of RESTful and SOAP API design and troubleshooting.
* Familiarity with data transformation tools (XSLT, JSON, XML) and ETL processes.
* Experience or knowledge of SQL, Data Mapping, Data Migration, and Process Modelling.
* Understanding of Data Architecture and integration patterns.
* Practical knowledge of user interface design and prototyping.


 Job Details:
   

  

* Start Date: ASAP
* End Date: January 31, 2026
* Location: Stockholm, with at least two days per week in the office.


 Required Skills:
   

  

* SAP SuccessFactors Data Model
* SAP Cloud Platform Integration
* Data Architecture
* Best Practices


**Language Requirement** 
 :
   

  

* English (Proficient)

title: Account Executive
description:
**Description**
 Automat-it is an all-in AWS Premier partner that empowers startups with DevOps and FinOps expertise and hands-on services. We guide and support hundreds of startups leveraging AWS smarter throughout their growth journey. We save our customers significant time to market and optimize their cloud performance and cost-effectiveness.
   

  

 Automat-it operates in more than seven countries across EMEA. We provide a dynamic environment where you can expand your professional expertise and make a significant impact.
   

  

 We’re seeking an Account Manager to drive Automat-it business growth in the North EMEA territory of Greenfield accounts while assuring a great customer experience. You’ll be responsible for the sales process, from prospecting to closing a deal.
   

  

 📍 Work location - Remote from Sweden or Amsterdam
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop and execute successful targeted territory development plans to help achieve or exceed growth, revenue, and margin targets
* Develop and manage all phases of the territory’s business development cycle, including managing proposal negotiations, the statement-of-work, and completion of all contract details
* Demonstrates breadth and depth of knowledge in aligning Automat-it capabilities to client business and positioning relative to competitors
* Prospect new customers and communicate with the AWS reps regularly
* Maintain and develop strategic vendor relations with AWS
* Regularly attend business events to promote and educate prospective clients on the benefits of Automat-it
* Work collaboratively with Marketing, Operations, Delivery, and Solutions Architects
* Commitment to regular business travel locally and abroad


**Requirements**
* 4+ years of experience in direct IT sales and business development from a complex cloud or software solutions
* Experience selling IT professional services (consulting/managed/staff services) or SaaS solutions designed for R&D or DevOps teams
* Ability to articulate the value proposition of professional services to technical and business stakeholders
* Proven successful track record of meeting and exceeding sales quotas
* Experience with selling AWS-based solutions
* Network and relationships with North EMEA-based digital native/ISV/startup companies
* Demonstrated ability to engage and influence C-level executives
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
* Excellent presentation and organizational skills
* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
* AWS cloud certificated - advantage
* Working experience with Salesforce or Hubspot - advantage


**Benefits**
* Professional training and certifications covered by the company (AWS, FinOps, Kubernetes, etc.)
* International work environment
* Referral program – enjoy cooperation with your colleagues and get a bonus
* Company events and social gatherings (happy hours, team events, knowledge sharing, etc.)
* Wellbeing and professional coaching through Oliva Health
* English classes.
* Soft skills training


 Automat-it is committed to fostering a workplace that promotes equal opportunities for all. We firmly believe that fostering a diverse workforce is crucial to our success. Our recruitment decisions are grounded in your experience and skills, recognizing the value you bring to our team.

title: Microsoft 365 & Azure Digital Forensics Architect
description:
Grow with us
   

  

**About This Opportunity**
 We are now searching for a senior Microsoft 365 & Azure Digital Forensics Architect, with extensive security and digital forensics expertise. In this role you will be key part of Ericsson Group Security’s Insider Threat Prevention & Security Investigations unit, which has a global responsibility covering Ericsson world-wide. You are expected to lead the design and development of state-of-the-art solutions in Microsoft 365 / Azure, leveraging their latest tools and technologies. You will also support Ericsson’s digital forensics specialists and security investigators with technical subject matter expertise.
   

  

 This role is within Ericsson Group Security’s Insider Threat Prevention & Security Investigations unit (ITP & SI), part of Ericsson’s global security organization, and is based in Ericsson’s global headquarters in Kista, Sweden.
   

  

 Join our Team
   

  

 What you will do
   

  

* Be the unit’s Microsoft 365 and Azure expert, leading the unit’s overall Microsoft Cloud architecture and strategy.
* Design, deploy, and operate highly secure, state-of-the-art eDiscovery, digital forensics, and insider threat prevention services in Microsoft 365 / Azure.
* Support Ericsson’s digital forensics specialists and security investigators in identifying, collecting, and analysing Microsoft 365 / Azure data.
* Stay up to date on Microsoft’s technical and solution roadmap relevant to eDiscovery, digital forensics, insider threat prevention, and security investigations.


 You will bring
   

  

**Mandatory Qualifications**
* A Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in computer science or related field, or equivalent experience.
* Expert knowledge of Microsoft Azure and M365, including:
* C#, ASP.Net (Razor/MVC)
* REST API’s (Microsoft Graph API’s and .net SDK)
* Azure App services and other technologies
* Azure DevOps Services (CI/CD)
* Microsoft PowerPlatform (PowerAutomate/Flow, SharePoint etc..)
* Microsoft Defender solutions
* Microsoft Purview
* Experience working according to agile principles.
* An analytical and curious mentality.
* A collaborative approach
* Willingness to teach and mentor junior colleagues
* Exceptional trouble shooting skills
* Fluent communication skills in written and spoken Swedish and English


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience designing, configuring, and operating Azure HCI environments
* Experience operating on-premise Windows environments (Microsoft Windows Server and SQL Server)
* Experience working in JIRA.
* Relevant Microsoft certifications. E.g.:
* PL-400: Microsoft Power Platform Developer
* Microsoft Certified: DevOps Engineer Expert
* Security certifications such as CISSP
* Knowledge of ISO27k compliance and certification requirements
* NIST Cybersecurity Framework
* Digital forensic certifications
* Knowledge of digital forensics, mobile forensics, network forensics, and eDiscovery processes, tools, and technologies


 As the position is based in Kista, Sweden, the right to live and work in Sweden is a prerequisite. Ericsson will not sponsor a work permit for this position.
   

  

 Vetting including references and relevant background screening will be conducted for final candidates.
   

  

 Location: Stockholm, Sweden
   

  

 Why join Ericsson?
   

  

 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build never seen before solutions to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators and specialists, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
